categories.name: #DadLife
categories.description: The ultimate collection of classic dad humor about parenting, family life, and all things dad. These jokes capture what it means to be a father.

categories.name: Wife
categories.description: Lighthearted marriage humor and spouse jokes that celebrate the ups and downs of married life with good-natured fun.

categories.name: Family
categories.description: Wholesome jokes about family relationships, kids, siblings, and relatives that everyone can relate to and enjoy together.

categories.name: Words & Puns
categories.description: Clever wordplay, brilliant puns, and linguistic humor that will make you groan and laugh at the same time. Perfect for word nerds!

categories.description: Hilarious jokes about home life, furniture, household chores, and all the funny situations that happen under your own roof.

categories.name: Food
categories.description: Delicious jokes about cooking, eating, restaurants, and everything food-related. Perfect to share at the dinner table!

categories.name: Animals
categories.description: Hilarious animal jokes featuring dogs, cats, wildlife, and creatures of all kinds. Perfect for animal lovers and pet owners!

categories.description: Office humor, business jokes, and funny takes on finances that anyone who's ever had a job can appreciate and relate to.

categories.description: Athletic humor and competition jokes covering football, baseball, basketball, golf, and all your favorite sports and games.

categories.name: Transportation

categories.name: Movies

categories.name: Music & Arts
categories.description: Musical jokes and artistic humor for creative minds. From instruments to paintings, these jokes celebrate the arts.

categories.name: Medical
categories.description: Doctor jokes and medical humor that's healthy for your funny bone. Perfect for healthcare workers and patients alike!

categories.name: Global
categories.description: International humor from around the world. Geography jokes, travel humor, and jokes about different countries and cultures.

categories.name: Clothing

categories.name: People

categories.name: History
categories.description: Jokes about the past, historical figures, and events that shaped our world. History class was never this funny!

categories.name: Religion
